ID_DATABASE_TYPE = #{idDatabaseType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ID_DATABASE_CONTYPE = #{idDatabaseContype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HOST_NAME = #{hostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
